content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Always hits... such delicious comfort food and always a vibe inside. Highly recommend the chicken kalguksu. Portions are large so you can comfortably split with someone. Sometimes there's a wait, but you get seated relatively quickly and food is always served efficiently. I've only ever gone at night, and parking is valet and $4.
